translations: n．陈词滥调，老生常谈：一个显而易见的真理，但由于过于普遍和平凡而缺乏新意。
· His speech was full of truisms.
他的演讲充满了陈词滥调。

sentences.sentence: I am tired of listening to his truisms.
sentences.translation: 我听腻了他的陈词滥调。

sentences.sentence: "If you can't measure it, you can't manage it" is one of the classic truisms of management.
sentences.translation: 如果你无法监测衡量，你就无法进行管理。

sentences.sentence: I wondered how many of these truisms had a scientific underpinning and how many were but myths.
sentences.translation: 我疑惑这些老生常谈有多少是有科学基础而有多少只是想当然。
